title: (x) Sean Patrick's - Koch Antiqua, Celtic Hand {Yves, Dav}
content:
I’m having troubles IDing both fonts in this logo. I appreciate your assistance!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [seanpatrick.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201115802/http:/typophile.com/files/seanpatrick.gif) | 76.07 KB |

 [‹ (x) Bebel Gilberto CD cover - Neue Helvetica {Dav, Jan}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201115802/http:/typophile.com/node/12626 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Artistas de Fashionista - Matrix Script {Dav} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201115802/http:/typophile.com/node/12630 "Go to next forum topic")
author: jillo

comments.content: The serif face is [Koch Antiqua](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201115802/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=LH.108039.0.1&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=Sean+Patricks&sampleSize=74e), but I think they autotraced it.
Excellent, thank you. Still looking for the other.

The other one seems to be ’ [Celtic Hand](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201115802/http:/moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/steffmann/samples/c/celthand.htm)’, _by [Dieter Steffmann](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201115802/http:/www.steffmann.de/)_..
